channel.title: Esoteric on Notes from the digital underground by Lngnmn
channel.description: Recent content in Esoteric on Notes from the digital underground by Lngnmn

item.title: No, it doesn't.
item.description: There is a typical quote from some random Chud on the internet: The location within the [high-dimensional hyper-] space represents the semantic meaning of the content, according to the embedding modelâ€™s weird, mostly incomprehensible understanding of the world. This is bullshit at so many levels, and in a such “lecturing” tone. First of all, there is no “understanding” whatsoever and it is not “of the world”. “The world” is at a fundamentally different level of abstraction from what has been used as “inputs” to a language model.
